title: Happy Birthday, Umi-san!
detail_text: <:th_ch0104/>Umi-san, today is your birthday right? Happy birthday!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Thank you, Dia. Because it’s my birthday, I have a renewed spirit to continue challenging myself in many ways.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Your determination is amazing, Umi-san. I too want to have your always ambitious attitude.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Eeh!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>? Did I say something weird? Why are you so surprised….?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>No…. It’s just, usually I’m told something along the lines of “You’re always so serious”.... So to be told otherwise straight up kind of surprised me<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Umi-san…. I say that plenty of times too. But I thought the Umi-san’s that is true to herself is wonderful….!  Isn’t it fine to be serious. That’s just our way of life!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Dia….!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Fufu. I heard that you like Japanese sweets, Umi-san, so I brought some specials with me. It might not be as good as Homura Manjuu, but let’s eat them together<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Yes! I’m looking forward to your specialty, Dia!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
